Class Customer

java.lang.Object
main.Person
main.Customer
public class Customer extends Person
Represents a customer in the banking system, inheriting properties from the Person class. A customer has an ID number and an array of associated accounts (e.g., checking, saving, credit).

    • Customer

      public Customer(String firstName, String lastName, String dob, String address, String city, String state, int zip, String phoneNumber, int idNumber)
      Constructor to initialize a Customer with personal details, ID number, and accounts.
      Parameters:
      firstName - the first name of the customer
      lastName - the last name of the customer
      dob - the date of birth of the customer
      address - the address of the customer
      city - the city of residence
      state - the state of residence
      zip - the zip code of the address
      phoneNumber - the phone number of the customer
      idNumber - the unique identification number for the customer
